QuestData.Title: Clefthoof Mastery
QuestData.Description: Banthar is the fiercest and most elusive of all the clefthoof in Outland. She's also the hairiest.$B$BIt is said that she roams with her clefthoof herd in the Spirit Fields near Oshu'gun.$B$BYou want to truly prove your hunting mastery? Bring me her horn!
QuestData.LogDescription: Acquire the Horn of Banthar and return it to Hemet Nesingwary at the Nesingwary Safari in Nagrand.
QuestData.CompletionText: A warm fire and a $g woman : man; at your side for idle chit-chat is something you can get at home. Here we hunt big game or die trying.
QuestData.RewardText: You did it! You took down Banthar! I never had a doubt, $n.$B$BHere, I think you've more than earned this.
